DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomized study adult IgA nephropathy . The investigator enrol 30 patient proteinuria exceeds 1 g per day biopsy proven IgA nephropathy . The experimental arm recieves non-pharmacological treatment , weight reduction protocol . All patient arm must reduce body weight 3-5 % baseline protocol . Another arm control group recieves standard treatment IgA nephropathy include ACEIs/ARBs blood pressure control ( target < 130/80 mmHg ) . The primary outcome proteinuria level . The secondary outcome cytokine inflammatory marker level include interleukin-6 , resistin , adiponectin , leptin monocyte chemoattractant protein-1 .
